member.name: P:MauiTestApp.Calendar`1.Days
member.summary: The list of displayed days.

member.name: P:MauiTestApp.Calendar`1.NavigatedDate
member.summary: The date the calendar will use to get the dates representing a time unit.

member.name: P:MauiTestApp.Calendar`1.TodayDate
member.summary: The date that the calendar should consider as 'Today'.

member.name: P:MauiTestApp.Calendar`1.NavigationLowerBound
member.summary: The lower bound of the day range.

member.name: P:MauiTestApp.Calendar`1.NavigationUpperBound
member.summary: The upper bound of the day range.

member.name: P:MauiTestApp.Calendar`1.StartOfWeek
member.summary: The day of week that should be considered as the start of the week.

member.name: P:MauiTestApp.Calendar`1.AutoRows
member.summary: Whether to automatically add as many rows as needed to represent the time unit or not.

member.name: P:MauiTestApp.Calendar`1.AutoRowsIsConsistent
member.summary: Whether to make sure the amount of rows stays the same across the time unit.
member.example: If the is Monday, the highest number of rows needed to display a month in 2022 is 6 rows (May, October etc). If this property is true, the calendar will display 6 rows regardless of whether a month needs less or not (April, November etc). Otherwise it will display as needed: (5 for April and November, 6 for May and October etc).

member.name: P:MauiTestApp.Calendar`1.SelectionAction
member.summary: The type of selection to use for selecting dates.

member.name: P:MauiTestApp.Calendar`1.NavigationLoopMode
member.summary: How the calendar handles navigation past the , , , and .

member.name: P:MauiTestApp.Calendar`1.SelectedDates
member.summary: The dates that are currently selected.

member.name: P:MauiTestApp.Calendar`1.Rows
member.summary: The number of rows to display.

member.name: P:MauiTestApp.Calendar`1.PageStartMode
member.summary: The way in which to extract a date from the to use as the first date of the first row.
member.example: If the is Monday and the navigated date is 15th July 2022: will extract 11th July 2022. will extract 27th June 2022 (First day in the week of 1st July 2022). will extract 27th December 2021 (First day in the week of 1st January 2022).
